__e: Four years ago... I set a trap for you... a trap for your death.
Because I put a bill together for all the things I've done for you, and it's a billion dollars.
No, I'm pretty sure I'm a bigger fool.
I knew it, so I prepared... some fish in my shack at the pier.
Is at this point that you're supposed to say stay and let me cook you breakfast in the morning.
She said breakfast is her favourite meal of the day and since it's her birthday... (Gasps) No, it's not!
So I've drawn up a study schedule for the first half of the year.
Catherine, do you really think that's why I came all this way, why I planned an entire weekend with the things that you love?
I got you a room right next to hers.
But I knew I was dying, so I readied myself for it.
I prepared myself for a life, a higher life, so to speak.
I saw her once with a young girl. Her name is on a list I prepared for the police.
I heard that you had an appointment, so I didn't prepare dinner.
I made you dinner and there's a nice,_BAR_hot bath waiting for you.
I went over to talk to you, and you weren't there, and so I just made dinner for Amy because she was home all alone.
I let out your clothes there's coffee
I packed your airplane ticket, some clothes and enough money to last you till you die.
I already packed your bag for Bobby's camp.
